sense.gloss: great success, big hit, smash hit, winner
being right on the mark (of a prediction), being bang on, hitting the nail on the head

sdata.j: だれもがそのミュージカルは↑大当↑↓|おおあ↓たり|すると↑思↑↓おも↓っていたが、まったく↑成功↑↓せいこう↓しなかった。
sdata.e: Everybody expected the musical to be a great hit, but it was far from being a success.

sdata.e: The new movie was a big hit.

sdata.e: The movie rights to a successful novel is easy money for the writer of the novel.
